name: Pineapp
description:
Use WASD and arrow keys to move!

Pineapp is a game where you can play custom games! Just go to the scratch page, remix, then edit one of the games and I will try to port it to this game!

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/781926974/

(i will eventually add a leave game button, so for now just refresh the page and reopen the game to leave)
